verses.roman:
yadyapi bhaṭṭera āge prabhura dhairya haila mana
durvāra udbhaṭa prema nahe samvaraṇa

synonyms: yadyapi—although; bhaṭṭera—of Vallabhācārya; āge—in front; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dhairya—patient; haila—was; mana—the mind; durvāra—difficult to stop; udbhaṭa—wonderful; prema—ecstatic love; nahe—there is not; samvaraṇa—checking.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu tried to restrain Himself as far as possible before Vallabhācārya, but although He tried to keep calm, His ecstatic love could not be checked.
